Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: New Series
Network: ABC ( USA)

follows June (Dreama Walker), a Midwestern girl with big dreams when she moved to New York. She is hired at a coffee shop and things go slowly until she meets Chloe (Krysten Ritter), who on the outside seems nice and inviting, but secretly is a swindler who takes June's savings and spends it. However, June is smarter than that and retaliates by selling all of Chloe's furniture. James Van Der Beek (playing himself) and Chloe soon learn that June may be naive, but she isn't dumb.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Apartment_23)
